SEARCH
Package io.brane.core.builder

Class Eip1559Builder

java.lang.Object
io.brane.core.builder.Eip1559Builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
TxBuilder<Eip1559Builder>
public final class Eip1559Builder extends Object implements TxBuilder<Eip1559Builder>
Builder for EIP-1559 transactions with dynamic fee market.

EIP-1559 transactions use separate maxFeePerGas and maxPriorityFeePerGas fields instead of a single gasPrice. This enables more predictable gas pricing and allows users to set a tip for miners/validators.

Example: 


 TransactionRequest tx = TxBuilder.eip1559()
     .from(sender)
     .to(recipient)
     .value(Wei.ether("1"))
     .maxFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(100))
     .maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(2))
     .gasLimit(21000)
     .build();

Thread Safety: This builder is not thread-safe. Each thread should use its own builder instance. The build() method creates an immutable TransactionRequest that is safe to share across threads.

Since:
0.1.0-alpha
See Also:

    • from

      public Eip1559Builder from(Address address)
      Description copied from interface: TxBuilder
      Sets the sender address.

      The sender address is required for all transactions. Calling TxBuilder.build() without setting a from address will result in incomplete transaction data that cannot be signed or submitted.

      Specified by:
      from in interface TxBuilder<Eip1559Builder>
      Parameters:
      address - the sender address (must not be null)
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • maxFeePerGas

      public Eip1559Builder maxFeePerGas(Wei maxFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum total fee per gas unit.

      This is the absolute maximum the sender is willing to pay per gas unit, including both the base fee and priority fee.

      Parameters:
      maxFeePerGas - the maximum fee per gas
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • maxPriorityFeePerGas

      public Eip1559Builder maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei maxPriorityFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum priority fee (tip) per gas unit.

      This is the tip paid directly to miners/validators to incentivize inclusion of the transaction.

      Parameters:
      maxPriorityFeePerGas - the maximum priority fee per gas
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • accessList

      public Eip1559Builder accessList(List<AccessListEntry> accessList)
      Sets the EIP-2930 access list for gas optimization.

      Access lists pre-declare which accounts and storage slots will be accessed, reducing gas costs for those accesses.

      Parameters:
      accessList - the list of access list entries, or null for no access list
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining
